title: Protestant Ref. effects on social roles

content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time for this question is 30 minutes. You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning your answer in the area below. Assess the extent to which the Protestant Reformation promoted new expectations about social roles in the sixteenth century. Refer to at least two social groups in your assessment.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
